Content: Has anyone else encountered that new wonderful bug in Bedrock 1.10.0 where menues and your inventory lags when opened? Even the crafting menu freezes the game
It’s occurred for me on Xbox and Mobile
I don’t know if it’s simply my realm or what
But when I craft a lot at once even in single player (like stacks of items) the game freezes and which
It doesn’t crash but it freezes and causes some lag spikes
It’s on many platforms I’ve not tried windows 10 yet but all others prove to repeat the glitch
It’s simply annoying because I’m trying to build and my game is so slow when opening menus and my inventory especially when I have a Shulker box or book and quil
Before the update it ran fine and had no issue
Sorry to ask though I was only wondering if others had experienced the same issues
